snippet: The defending World Cup champion Marcel Hirscher of Austria protected his first-run lead to comfortably win a giant slalom race, helped by the Frenchman Alexis Pinturault’s mistake three gates from the end.
abstract: Austrian skier Marcel Hirscher, defending World Cup champion, comfortably wins giant slalom race in Val d’Isere, France.
lead_paragraph: The defending World Cup champion Marcel Hirscher of Austria protected his first-run lead to comfortably win a giant slalom race, helped by the Frenchman Alexis Pinturault’s mistake three gates from the end.
